name: Example Story
message: Share a favorite memory or story about Logan. What made her special? What moments do you cherish? Your stories help keep her memory alive and show the world who she truly was.

name: Example Photo Memory
message: Share a memory about a special photo of Logan. Describe the moment, the occasion, or what made it meaningful. Photos capture moments, but your words capture the feeling.

name: Example Tribute
message: Share a tribute to Logan - how she touched your life, what she meant to you, or how you'll honor her memory. Tributes celebrate her impact and the legacy she leaves behind.

name: Example Message
message: Share a message of support for Logan's family, words of comfort, or your commitment to justice. Every message of solidarity strengthens the fight for change.
